game.ticketCostPlaqueText:
Please choose your 
ticket cost and press "BUY"
game.ticketCostPlaqueTextTry:
Please choose your 
ticket cost and press "TRY"
game.bonusPlaqueText:
Wake one of the 
sleeping monkeys 
to reveal a prize!

help.title: HOW TO PLAY
help.txt3:
If the ball finishes in the middle 
box you are taken to the 
bonus game.
help.txt2:
Light up 3 banana segments to
win that prize.
help.txt:
Press the monkey to get him to 
release the ball into the board.
You have 7 balls to drop.

result.sorry:
SORRY, YOU HAVE NOT WON. 

BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME
